name: Kick Back
description:
you're an astronaut floating in space and you have to use you guns kickback to dodge bullets, lasers and explosives. defeat enemies to get the highest score you can

the audio may be loud I would recommend starting with volume somewhat low if your using headphone 

sorry for the screen shots being blurry that's not how the actual game looks.

there is a leader bored but only local and it does not display names.

I forgot to add the credits to the game itself but I made everything myself with      game maker studio 2 of the art and as the game engine and I used jfxr for sound effects and bosca ceoil for music
